title: The Rinaldi Triplets
description: ***Series has been republished as The Shadow Army Trilogy***The Rinaldi Triplets share more than family ties.Bound together through their shared gift, Chloe, Cait, and Cassandra Rinaldi See the past, present, and future. But when their visions paint a dark picture of the destructive forces contained inside the Drogue, Cassandra struggles against the vision that sets her on a path to fulfilling the dreaded fate she has foreseen.Set thirty-one years before the events of The Drogue, the Rinaldi triplets will be tested, challenged, and pulled in different directions. Torn between their love for each other and the different paths of their destiny, these three sisters stand at the heart of the Drogueâ€™s fate. But will they stand united?
author: M.A. Nichols
